title: Coerver coaching method. Vol. 3
brief_description: Wiel Coerver, renowned Dutch soccer champion teaches a comprehensive range of soccer skills. Volume 3 of this three-part collection includes the following playing techniques: one on two combination, overlapping, crosses and through passes, heading, shooting.
